key_risks: Supply chain vulnerabilities including material shortages, logistics challenges, and labor disputes
Economic sensitivity, particularly in the aerospace and consumer goods sectors
Intense competition in packaging and aerospace industries
Regulatory compliance costs and operational complexities
Leadership and organizational instability due to high employee turnover and frequent leadership changes
controversies: Ongoing legal proceedings with undisclosed details
environmental_issues: Commitment to sustainability initiatives, including reducing environmental footprint and improving energy efficiency
social_issues: Emphasis on ethical labor practices and adherence to international labor standards
governance_issues: Leadership and organizational instability impacting operational continuity and employee morale
